title: 【求助】正版启动器无法开启游戏
txt_content:
[17:29:23 ERROR]: Game ended with bad state (exit code -805306369)
[17:29:23 INFO]: Ignoring visibility rule and showing launcher due to a game crash
[17:29:23 INFO]: Deleting C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\versions\1.8.8\1.8.8-natives-2692459346316
[17:29:23 WARN]: Couldn't delete C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\versions\1.8.8\1.8.8-natives-2692459346316 - scheduling for deletion upon exit
求助求助求助！！！！！{:10_528:}{:10_528:}{:10_498:}

replies.author: 极光酋长
replies.txt_content:
显卡驱动？！
解决：更新驱动---驱动精灵 or 360
——有所帮助？

replies.author: 魂言兮
replies.txt_content: 吧C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\这个文件夹删掉重新下载即可

replies.author: 395176149a
replies.txt_content:
魂言兮 发表于 2015-11-21 11:59
吧C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\这个文件夹删掉重新下载即可
左下角【edit profile】 把Automatically…的对勾去掉，use version选想要的版本，不要选use latest version。

395176149a 发表于 2015-11-21 13:11
左下角【edit profile】 把Automatically…的对勾去掉，use version选想要的版本，不要选use latest vers ...
已经弄好了  不过多谢了0.0.
